TopicTitle: Big framerate drop in SPH when looking outside

Articles.Content:
So after 1.2.2 update I started having this massive framerate drop from normal 80fps to 19fps when looking direction of the outdoor scenery in SPH. This only happens in SPH and not in any other place. I have tried verifying steam cache and reinstalling the game, but nothing seems to work. Any ideas what might be causing this? I am running on windows 10 64bit. Also debug console gives these errors https://gyazo.com/3a6f5f70b562c389c6c61f54afb1aa86

Every answer is appreciated

Hi Ben_P, there's a lot of animated objects when looking in that direction, especially when in the SPH as the camera view is lower down, you'll be more likely to have several Kerbals wandering around.

The SPH and VAB Kerbals are resource intensive, so they can be disabled via the settings screen.

Just disable space center crew and you should find your FPS is much improved.

Hope this helps.

Oh, thanks alot, it helped. I would have never thought that with my specs but it just literaly rose my fps from that 19 to 180 XD. Mayby I should have tried that before and not be so confident on my system. Anyways, thank you!
